mapper.sql:
a.guid, a.instanceGuid, a.gzlzt, a.lcjssj, a.sqbm, a.sqbmguid,a.sqr, a.sqrguid, a.sqsj, a.sqdh, a.ptdh, a. ddsx, a.rzrq, a.tfrq, a.rzts, a.zje, a.kpzt, a.yszt, a.houseGuid, a.xfdh, a.ddzt, a.qlzt, a.cwskzt, a.ffyj, a. jff, a.jg, a.djzk, a.tszk, a.ffxj, a.zkje, a.sjfj, a.qllrr, a.qlsj, a.qlr, a.qlrguid, a.qlbz, a.qljszt, a.qtfy, a. ysk, a.yj, a.yk, a.ttmc, a.xm, a.lxdh, a.sfz, a.krly, a.bz, a.rzsj, a.tfsj, a.laifou, a.zdqxsj_xs, a.zdqxsj_fz, a. noshow, a.noshowzrr, a.noshowqrsj, a.noshowbz, a.qxbz, a.yzGuid, a.ptxxGuid, a.yjl, a.hxyl, a.ywtcxs, a. sfdc, a.sfycfj, a.noshowcldh, a.noshowclsj, a.noshowclbz, a.zcqx, a.yhje, a.yhsqr, a.yhsm, a.itemid, a. status, a.ddskzt, a.ywy, a.ywyid, a.rzsjqj, a.fj_ext
, b.kqzyh,b.xpze,b.jdyh, b.xszf, b.fyjl, b.pyjl, b.hysx
, c.fangxing as house_fangxing,c.dong as house_dong,c.louceng as house_louceng,c.fjh as house_fjh ,c.xqhy as house_xqhy ,f.qtmc as house_hotelName
mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from fwddzb a left join fwddzb_ex b on a.guid =b.guid left join house c on a.houseGuid =c.guid
order by $orderByClause$

mapper.select:
SELECT a.ddzt AS STATUS ,COUNT(1) as cnt FROM fwddzb a left join house c on a.houseGuid = c.guid LEFT JOIN fwqtxx f ON (a.guid = f.houseGuid )
GROUP BY ddzt UNION SELECT 5 AS STATUS ,COUNT(1)AS cnt FROM fwddzb a LEFT JOIN house c ON (a.houseGuid = c.guid ) LEFT JOIN fwqtxx f ON (a.guid = f.houseGuid ) WHERE a.noshow='1'

select cont, ts, hotelName, xpze, yhje, xfje, ffyj, xpyj, jdfx from hotel_sum
where hotelName= #{hotelName}
